snippet: President Obama is taking his argument in favor of a 30 percent minimum tax on millionaires to Florida, where he will tell students at Florida Atlantic University that "in this country, prosperity has never trickled down from a wealthy few," reports...
abstract: President Obama is taking his argument in favor of a 30 percent minimum tax on millionaires to Florida, where he will tell students at Florida Atlantic University that "in this country, prosperity has never trickled down from a wealthy few," reports Jackie Calmes for The New York Times.

headline.main: Obama to Make Case for 'Buffett Rule'
